value.title: Pence's political future remains clouded by Trump
value.excerpt: Days after the election, Mike Pence called a close friend for a 30-minute conversation to analyze what had just happened and what it all might mean for the future of the Republican Party. According to this person, the vice president was upbeat about the success of GOP candidates lower down the ballot,

value.title: Pence says US 'a week and a half away' from 'likely approval' of first coronavirus vaccine
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence said Friday that the U.S. is “maybe just a week and a half away” from the “likely approval” of the first vaccine to protect against the novel coronavirus.

value.title: Videos, virtual events and planned trips: Biden, Obama, Pence, Trump weigh in on Georgia runoffs
value.excerpt: President Trump, his predecessor and soon-to-be successor in the White House, as well as Vice President Mike Pence, are all weighing in on Georgia’s two Jan. 5 Senate runoff elections, where the Republican majority in the chamber is up for grabs.

value.title: Trump, Pence to campaign in Georgia as Senate runoff turnout concerns grow among GOP
value.excerpt: Mike Pence and President Donald Trump's rallies for Georgia's senators will be against a backdrop of growing concerns about GOP turnout in the Senate runoff election.

value.title: Coronavirus updates: Pence says vaccine could be shipped in 2 weeks; Gov. Ron DeSantis says Florida schools to stay open in 2021
value.excerpt: California Gov. Gavin Newsom warns of tougher stay-at-home order. Michigan Rep. John Chirkun tests positive. U.S. deaths top 268K. Latest COVID news.

value.title: Vice President Mike Pence will visit Memphis Thursday. Here's why.
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence is planning to travel to Memphis Thursday to discuss Operation Warp Speed, the nation's COVID-19 pandemic response.

value.title: Mike Pence will visit Savannah Friday to rally for Loeffler, Perdue
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence will be in Georgia for the second time in two weeks on Friday, and this time, he’ll be in Savannah. Pence will return to

value.title: Pence Says Covid Vaccine Distribution Could Begin Mid-December
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence told governors on Monday that distribution of a coronavirus vaccine could begin by the third week of December, signaling that U.S. regulators will swiftly approve an emergency authorization for the first shots.

value.title: Pence pitches Georgia senators as last line of GOP defense
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence campaigned Friday in Georgia in support of the state’s two Republican senators and warning of a potential Democratic takeover of Washington in January

value.title: Mike Pence rallies with Loeffler, Perdue in Cherokee County
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence traveled to Georgia today to attend rallies in support of incumbent Republican Sens. Kelly Loeffler and David Perdue, as those Senate runoff races begin to take the state's political center stage.

value.title: VP Mike Pence’s daughter delivers powerful explanation of where ‘sin can lead’
value.excerpt: Doubt is a normal part of any faith journey, but how do doubt and sin interact — and what role does spiritual uncertainty play in pushing people away from God?

value.title: Trump administration does not support lockdown, school closures: Pence
value.excerpt: The Trump administration does not support another lockdown or school closures to stem the spread of the deadly coronavirus, Vice President Mike Pence said on Thursday, even as infections have hit record highs in recent days in the United States.

value.title: Biden paints Trump as reckless as Pence and science advisers cheer vaccine news
value.excerpt: At dueling public events, the president-elect and the White House offered starkly different views of Trump’s pandemic response.

value.title: Pence on virus: US 'has never been more prepared'
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence offered an upbeat assessment of the coronavirus situation in the U.S., despite a surge in cases, hospitalizations and more than 250,000 deaths. He spoke at the first coronavirus task force briefing in months.

value.title: Pence to campaign Friday in Georgia runoffs, but no word on a Trump trip
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence heads to Georgia on Friday, to campaign with Sens. David Perdue and Kelly Loeffler, the Republican incumbents in the state’s twin Senate runoff elections. But there's no word on whether President Trump will head to Georgia.

value.title: The Latest: Pence offers positive COVID-19 assessment in US
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence is offering an upbeat assessment of the status of the coronavirus in the U.S., despite a surge in cases, hospitalizations and more than a quarter of a million deaths. Pence says President Donald Trump directed that Thursday’s briefing be held.

value.title: Pence spox debunks Huffington Post reporter who claimed VP, Karen Pence didn't wear masks at SpaceX launch
value.excerpt: A spokesperson for Vice President Mike Pence shot down reporting from a Huffington Post journalist who reported that he and Second Lady Karen Pence did not wear masks at Sunday's visit to NASA's Kennedy Space Center. NASA has made its first operational ...

value.title: Pence, Fauci Praise Vaccine Developments
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence praised recent vaccine advancements during a call with governors Monday, calling it welcome news for Americans. Mr. Pence spoke soon after Moderna said early results showed its experimental coronavirus vaccine [was 94.

value.title: What does Mike Pence's future look like after election loss?
value.excerpt: For Mike Pence, a second term for President Donald Trump would have been a 2024 ticket to Republican frontrunner status.

value.title: Vice President Mike Pence to view SpaceX Crew-1 launch from Kennedy Space Center
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence will attend Sunday's attempted launch of Crew-1 mission to the International Space Station.

value.title: Mike Pence offers delusional response to MAGA crowd chanting ‘four more years’
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence signaled on Friday that President Donald Trump has absolutely no plan to concede despite losing the presidential election. On Friday, Pence delivered a speech at the Conservative think tank known as the Council for National Policy.

value.title: Let Mike Pence handle the transition
value.excerpt: The period between an incumbent's defeat and the new president's inauguration is always awkward. At the end of this lame duck-ship, the outgoing president

value.title: Porter County write-in ballots give nod to Kanye West; Mike Pence gets two votes for president in Lake
value.excerpt: If impromptu write-in candidates in Porter County could have been elected president, Kanye West would have been the big winner.

value.title: This is Mike Pence’s moment
value.excerpt: President Trump will not step up to address the covid-19 surge. Maybe his vice president can.

value.title: Pence dumps Florida vacation to stay in Washington amid election challenge
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence canceled plans for a Florida getaway this week to stay in Washington as President Trump continues to challenge election results, according to a report. Pence, who

value.title: Vice President Mike Pence expected in Sanibel on Tuesday
value.excerpt: An FAA alert suggests that Pence's visit will span Tuesday through Saturday. Pence has a long history of vacationing on the island.

value.title: Can American virtues (and maybe Mike Pence) save us?
value.excerpt: Over the weekend, the 2020 presidential election abruptly shifted from slow motion to real-time. In rapid succession, former Vice President Joe Biden secured victory in the battleground state of Penns

value.title: Pence on 2020 race: ‘It ain’t over til it’s over...and this AIN’T over!’
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence on Monday rallied his staff, saying the 2020 presidential race “ain’t over,” as the Trump campaign mounts legal battles in a number of key battleground states where President-elect Joe Biden is leading.

value.title: Mike Pence heading to Florida vacation island
value.excerpt: Pence is scheduled to travel to Sanibel, Florida, Tuesday through Saturday, according to the Federal Aviation Administration.

value.title: After a second loss to Greg Pence, Jeannine Lee Lake sets her sights on 2022
value.excerpt: With 97% of precincts counted in this year's Sixth District Congressional race, Greg Pence had 68.6% of the vote to Jeannine Lee Lake's 27.8%.
